gui.actinoale.radialMenu.title: Radial menu
text.autoconfig.actionale.option.exportN: Export named keycodes to option file
Whether Actionale should write named keys (when true) or GLFW keycodes (when false)
text.autoconfig.actionale.option.radialM: Minimum sides that a radial menu must have
text.autoconfig.actionale.option.leaderK: GLFW keycode for leader key, defaults to '\' (backslash)
